63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:I did not feel jealous of any woman as much as I did of Khadija because Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to mention her very often. He married me after three years of her death, and his Lord (or Gabriel) ordered him to give her the good news of having a palace of Qasab in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: بَاب تَزْوِيجِ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ خَدِيجَةَ وَفَضْلِهَا رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهَا
chapter.eng-name: The marriage of the Prophet (ﷺ) with Khadija رضي الله عنها and her superiority
